ai.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your HR assistant. How can I help you today?
ai.budgetExceeded: Your monthly AI budget has been exceeded
ai.accessDisabled: AI access has been disabled for your account
ai.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests, please try again later
ai.disclaimer: Responses are based on company policies and SOPs. Verify with HR for official decisions.
ai.footerDisclaimer: AI responses are for guidance only. Consult HR for official decisions.

guidelines.title: AI Assistant Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Understanding how the HRplus Cerebra AI Assistant works and protects your data

roleAccess.title: Role-Based Access Control
roleAccess.description: The AI respects your user role and permissions. Information provided is tailored to your access level within the organization. Admin and HR users may see more detailed information than regular employees.

companyPolicies.title: Company Policy Compliance
companyPolicies.description: All responses are guided by your company's uploaded policy documents. The AI will reference specific policies when answering questions about procedures, benefits, and workplace rules.

sop.title: Standard Operating Procedures
sop.description: When asking about how to complete tasks, the AI will provide step-by-step guidance based on your company's defined SOPs. This ensures consistency in task execution across the organization.

helpCenter.title: Help Center Integration
helpCenter.description: The AI draws from the Help Center knowledge base to provide accurate guidance on system features and functionality. For complex issues, it may direct you to relevant help articles.

piiProtection.title: PII Protection
piiProtection.description: Personal Identifiable Information (PII) such as employee contact details, salaries, and bank information is protected. Only users with appropriate permissions can access sensitive employee data through the AI.

escalation.title: Sensitive Topic Escalation
escalation.description: For sensitive matters such as terminations, legal issues, harassment, discrimination, or salary disputes, the AI will recommend contacting HR directly. These topics require human judgment and official documentation.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The AI Assistant provides guidance based on available company policies, SOPs, and knowledge base articles. For official decisions, legal matters, or sensitive HR issues, always consult with your HR representative directly. AI responses should be verified before taking action on important matters.

appraisals.title: Performance Appraisals
appraisals.subtitle: Evaluate employees on competencies, responsibilities, and goals

tabs.myAppraisalsHelp: View your performance appraisals across cycles. See your scores for competencies, responsibilities, and goals. Click on an appraisal to view detailed feedback.
tabs.evaluateTeamHelp: Evaluate team members assigned to you. Rate their competencies, responsibilities, and goals. Each category's item weights must total 100%.
tabs.manageCyclesHelp: Create and manage appraisal cycles. Set category weights (competency, responsibility, goal) that total 100%. Add participants and track completion rates.

tabs.myReviewsHelp: View and complete feedback reviews assigned to you. Click on a pending review to provide feedback for colleagues, managers, or direct reports.
tabs.myFeedbackHelp: See aggregated feedback you've received from peers, managers, and direct reports. View scores and comments to understand your strengths and areas for improvement.
tabs.manageCyclesHelp: Create and manage 360 review cycles for your direct reports. Track completion rates and results.
tabs.centralCyclesHelp: View and manage organization-wide 360 review cycles created by HR.
tabs.managerCyclesHelp: View all manager-created review cycles across the organization.
